Command.defaultValue: No information available for this reader
Alien RFID Tag Reader, Model: ALR-9800 (Four Antenna / Multi-Protocol / 915 MHz)

************************************************************** GENERAL FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** Help: Display descriptive help text. Info: Display current settings. !: Repeat last command. Save: Save current settings to permanent storage. Function: Get|Set the operating mode. ReaderName: Get|Set the user-defined name for the reader. ReaderType: Get a brief description of the reader. ReaderVersion: Get the release number for the reader firmware. ReaderNumber: Get|Set the numerical identifier for this reader. Uptime: Get the elapsed time since the reader was booted. Username: Get|Set the username (default: "alien"). Password: Get|Set the password (default: "password"). MaxAntenna: Get the index of the maximum addressable antenna. AntennaSequence: Get|Set antenna sequence. RFAttenuation: Get|Set the RF attenuation from max power. RFLevel: Get|Set the RF power level. RFModulation: Get|Set the RF modulation scheme. FactorySettings: Return all settings to their factory defaults. Reboot: Reboot the reader. ************************************************************** NETWORK FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** MACAddress: Get this reader's unique network interface identifier. DHCP: Get|Set whether to dynamically configure network settings. DHCPtimeout: Get|Set the delay before giving up on the DHCP server. IPAddress: Get|Set this reader's IP Address. Hostname: Get|Set this reader's network Hostname. UpgradeAddress: Get|Set the URL of Reader Upgrades. UpgradePort: Get|Set the port used to connect to Reader Upgrade Service. NetworkUpgrade: Get|Set whether to connect to a Reader Upgrade Service on next boot. Gateway: Get|Set the address of the Gateway server on the LAN. Netmask: Get|Set this reader's network subnet mask. DNS: Get|Set the address of the DNS server on the LAN. NetworkTimeout: Get|Set the delay (in secs) before closing an idle network connection. CommandPort: Get|Set the port used to connect to the reader. HeartbeatAddress: Get|Set the destination address for Heartbeat messages. HeartbeatPort: Get|Set the destination port for Heartbeat messages. HeartbeatTime: Get|Set the delay (in secs) between Heartbeat messages. HeartbeatCount: Get|Set the total number of heartbeat messages to send. Ping: Ping a network address. NetworkReset: Reset network interfaces to current settings. ************************************************************** TIME FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** TimeServer: Get|Set the IP address of a network time server. Time: Get|Set current local time (YYYY/MM/DD hh:mm:ss). TimeZone: Get|Set the local timezone (+/- hours from GMT). ************************************************************** MACRO FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** MacroList: Lists the names of all of the installed macros. MacroView: Displays the contents of a named macro. MacroDel: Deletes a named macro. MacroDelAll: Deletes all macros. MacroRun: Executes the named macro. MacroStartRec: Begins recording a named macro. MacroStopRec: Stops the macro currently being recorded. ************************************************************** TAG LIST FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** PersistTime: Get|Set the time (in secs) that a tag remains on the TagList. TagListFormat: Get|Set the format for the TagList. TagListAntennaCombine: Get|Set whether to combine tag reads from many antennas into one entry. TagListCustomFormat: Get|Set the custom TagList format. TagListMillis: Get|Set the flag enabling millisecond time resolution in TagLists. TagList: Get the current TagList held in memory. t: Get the current TagList held in memory. Clear: Erase the TagList held in memory. ************************************************************** ACQUISITION PARAMETERS ************************************************************** AcquireMode: Get|Set the method used to acquire tags. TagType: Get|Set the bitmap specifying which tag protocols to use. AcqMask: Get|Set the mask used to find specific tags. AcqC1Cycles: Get|Set outer loops on Class 1 reads. AcqC1Count: Get|Set inner loops on Class 1 reads. AcqC1EnterWakeCount: Get|Set number of wakes on start of Class 1 inner loop. AcqC1ExitWakeCount: Get|Set number of wakes at end of Class 1 outer loop. AcqC1SleepCount: Get|Set number of sleeps issued after each Class 1 read. AcqC0Cycles: Get|Set outer loops on Class 0 reads. AcqC0Count: Get|Set inner loops on Class 0 reads. AcqG2Cycles: Get|Set outer loops on Gen 2 reads. AcqG2Count: Get|Set inner loops on Gen 2 reads. AcqG2Q: Get|Set Q parameter for Gen 2 reads. Wake: Issue a C1 wake command to the entire RF field. Sleep: Issue a C1 sleep command to the entire RF field. ************************************************************** EXTERNAL I/O FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** ExternalInput: Get the current state of the digitial input pins. ExternalOutput: Get|Set the current state of the digital output pins. InvertExternalInput: Get|Set whether to invert the reported state of the digital input pins. InvertExternalOutput: Get|Set whether to invert the reported and applied state of the digital output pins. InitExternalOutput: Get|Set the state of the digital output pins on startup. ************************************************************** AUTONOMOUS MODE FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** AutoMode: Get|Set the AutoMode-active flag. AutoWaitOutput: Get|Set the output state while waiting for a start trigger. AutoWorkOutput: Get|Set the output state while performing the AutoMode action. AutoTrueOutput: Get|Set the output state when AutoMode evaluates to TRUE. AutoFalseOutput: Get|Set the output state when AutoMode evaluates to FALSE. AutoStartTrigger: Get|Set the I/O edges to start AutoMode. AutoStopTrigger: Get|Set the I/O edges to stop AutoMode. AutoStopTimer: Get|Set maximum time (in msec) to spend performing AutoAction. AutoStartPause: Get|Set the delay (in msec) after a trigger before starting AutoAction. AutoTruePause: Get|Set time (in msec) to pause after AutoMode evaluates to TRUE. AutoFalsePause: Get|Set time (in msec) to pause after AutoMode evaluates to FALSE. AutoModeTriggerNow: Manually trigger AutoMode. AutoAction: Get|Set the action to perform in AutoMode. AutoModeReset: Turn OFF AutoMode and reset AutoMode parameters to default values. ************************************************************** NOTIFICATION FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** NotifyFormat: Get|Set the format used for notification messages. NotifyHeader: Get|Set whether to include headers and footers in notifications. NotifyAddress: Get|Set the destination address for notification messages. NotifyTime: Get|Set the period at which timed notifications are sent. NotifyTrigger: Get|Set the trigger for issuing notification messages. NotifyKeepAliveTime: Get|Set the time (in seconds) to hold the notify socket open. MailServer: Get|Set the address of the server used to send e-mail notifications. MailFrom: Get|Set the reported sender of e-mail notifications. NotifyMode: Get|Set the NotifyMode-active flag. NotifyRetryCount: Get|Set the number of times to retry a failed TCP notification. NotifyRetryPause: Get|Set the time (in seconds) between TCP notification retries. NotifyNow: Manually trigger NotifyMode. ************************************************************** TAG PROGRAMMING FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** Program: Programs a tag in the field with the supplied ID. ProgProtocol: Get|Set the protocol for programming a tag. ProgAttempts: Get|Set the number of attempts to program a tag. ProgReadAttempts: Get|Set the number of attempts to read a tag before and after programming. ProgEraseAttempts: Get|Set the number of attempts to erase a tag during programming. ProgAntenna: Get|Set the antenna on which to program tags. ProgramID: Get|Set the starting ID used to program tags in AutoMode. ProgramPassCode: Get|Set the passcode used to lock/kill tags in AutoMode. ProgIncrementOnFail: Get|Set whether to increment ProgramID if the programming attempt failed. ProgSuccessFormat: Get|Set the flag determining the format of successful programming responses. Verify: Verify the presence of a tag, returning any detected tag data. Erase: Erase a tag in the field. Lock: Lock a tag in the field with the supplied passcode. Kill: Kill a tag in the field with the supplied ID and passcode. ************************************************************** EXPERIMENTAL FUNCTIONS ************************************************************** LBT: Get|Set if the reader will look at ambient RF before modulating. LBTLimit: Get|Set acceptable ambient RF level for reading. LBTValue: Get ambient RF measured by LBT circuit. AcqG2Session: Get|Set Gen2 session used in inventory. AcqG2Select: Get|Set the number of times B->A select is issued at the start of a Gen2 inventory cycle.
